name: Freshfel Europe - the forum for the European fresh fruits and vegetables chain
goal:
• Represent the interests of small, medium and large companies and associations in the fresh produce sector.
• Coordinate and facilitate promotional activities with a view to raising consumption
• Enhance EU single market and international trade and facilitate the distribution of fresh produce for omproved accessibility and availability for consumers
• Provide a networking platform where sector representatives from across the chain can meet, share views and gear positions to one another.
• Update members on recent legislative and commercial developments in the fresh produce sector.
• Enhance health and safety aspects of fresh fruits and vegetables
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
EU agricultural policy
Promotion policy
School fruit scheme
Food and plant safety
Quality, nutrition and consumers health
Trade policy and bilateral agreements
SPS issues for market access
Research and innovation
Customs and trade facilitation
